title: Pat-A-Cake, Pat-A-Cake...We Made A Mistake!
description: Who hasn't done the time-honored nursery rhyme, Pat-a-Cake, with their child at least a hundred times? Well, this version is sure to create just as many smiles, as your child is slowly led into baking...well, let's just say it's not exactly a cake!Mother and son authors Melanie Dellas and John Woodworth take you on a light-hearted and cute tour of one of the silly things they do at home with John's little brother, Nick, and their little dog, Clio.
author: Melanie Dellas
